mapper.sql: t.my_coupon_id as t_my_coupon_id, t.coupon_name as t_coupon_name, t.coupon_money as t_coupon_money, t.coupon_id as t_coupon_id, t.begin_time as t_begin_time, t.end_time as t_end_time, t.coupon_code as t_coupon_code, t.relation_id as t_relation_id, t.relation_type as t_relation_type, t.user_id as t_user_id, t.coupon_img as t_coupon_img, t.status as t_status, t.last_use_time as t_last_use_time, t.can_use_money as t_can_use_money, t.ctime as t_ctime, t.remark as t_remark
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,u.username as username from bjwg_my_coupon t left join bjwg_user u on u.user_id = t.user_id
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into bjwg_my_coupon (coupon_name, coupon_money, coupon_id, begin_time, end_time, coupon_code, relation_id, relation_type, user_id, coupon_img, status, last_use_time, can_use_money, ctime, remark ) values (#{couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{couponCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{relationType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{couponImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastUseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{canUseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into bjwg_my_coupon (coupon_name, coupon_money, coupon_id, begin_time, end_time, coupon_code, relation_id, relation_type, user_id, coupon_img,status,last_use_time, can_use_money,ctime,remark ) values
(#{item.couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.couponMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.couponCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.relationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.relationType,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{item.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.couponImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{item.lastUseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.canUseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from bjwg_my_coupon t left join bjwg_user u on u.user_id = t.user_id
mapper.update:
update bjwg_my_coupon
coupon_name = #{couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coupon_money = #{couponMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
coupon_code = #{couponCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
relation_id = #{relationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
relation_type = #{relationType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
coupon_img = #{couponImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
last_use_time = #{lastUseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
can_use_money = #{canUseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where my_coupon_id = #{myCouponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bjwg_my_coupon set coupon_name = #{couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_money = #{couponMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, coupon_code = #{couponCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, relation_id = #{relationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, relation_type = #{relationType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, coupon_img = #{couponImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, last_use_time = #{lastUseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, can_use_money = #{canUseMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where my_coupon_id = #{myCouponId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
